root.name: The 11th Hour
root.description: OverviewThe 11th hour takes place 80 years after the events in The 7th Guest, and again pits players against Henry Stauf. The player returns to the Stauf mansion, which has decayed significantly over the years. New puzzles and locations not seen in the first game are featured prominently in the story, which centers around the player character (Carl Denning) investigating the disappearance of Robin Morales.

similar_games.game: The Beast Within: A Gabriel Knight Mystery
